author: cms-sw
body: We can not move to GCC 13.3.0 yet as cuda does not support it ( see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/9270 ). This PR proposes to apply https://github.com/gcc-mirror/gcc/commit/96482ffe60d9bdec802fcad705c69641b2a3e040 which is needed to avoid build errors with c++20 standard
title: [GCC13] Patch applied for c++20
